      sets the event of a given id to the specified event
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to be set
      event - the event to be set to the given id

    • inviteToEvent

      @PostMapping("/{eventId}/invite") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity inviteToEvent(@PathVariable String eventId, @RequestParam String email, @RequestParam EventRole role)
      sends an invitation email to the given email with a link to register with the specified role to the specified event
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to send an invitation to
      email - the email to send the invitation link to
      role - the role which gets assigend to the invited person
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information of the process

    • addAccountToEvent

      @PostMapping("/{eventId}/add-account/{accountId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addAccountToEvent(@PathVariable String eventId, @PathVariable String accountId, @RequestParam(required=false) String token)
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to add the account to
      accountId - the id of the account to be added
      token - the token in the invitation link to verify the invitation
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information of the process

    • changeRole

      @PostMapping("/{eventId}/change-role/{accountId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity changeRole(@PathVariable String eventId, @PathVariable String accountId, @RequestParam EventRole role)
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event where the role of the account has to be changed
      accountId - the id of the account where the role has to be changed
      role - the role to change the role of the account to
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information of the process

      eventId - the id of the event to remove the account from
      accountId - the id of the account to be removed from the event

      ResponseEntity with information of the process
